snippet.title: The Office: Somehow We Manage - Trailer30 - GP - 1920x1080 - LAND
snippet.description:
Tap your way to record proﬁts at Dunder Miﬄin! Save your branch from downsizing with Michael, Jim, Pam, Dwight, and your Scranton branch favorites and make some sales in this free idle game!
Play through some of the most memorable moments in a brand new free idle game inspired by NBC’s critically acclaimed Emmy®- winning U.S. version of the comedy The Office, which is streaming exclusively on Peacock. Save your branch from downsizing by selling paper to unlock and upgrade characters, desks, and memorable episodes.  

Regional manager Michael Scott needs to improve the Scranton branch’s performance to avoid downsizing - easier said than done when Jim won’t stop pranking Dwight, Dwight won’t stop complaining about Jim, and Stanley won’t stop doing crossword puzzles. Look out, though; at the end of each business day, Corporate takes their share of the money. Sorry, Michael, it’s back to work at the oﬃce tomorrow. But don’t worry, any upgrades you’ve built will stay with you as you progress in the game, and you’ll be making more in-game cash before you know it.
